column4: hmm, i am trying to install ubuntu from the livecd, but it i cant make the last partition that is /home
More information about your planned partitioning would be very helpful.
I got a 500GB HDD, I want to make a 30GB / and 1GB Swap and rest on home but it doesent work
did you make / a primary partition and swap logical and /home logical?
if i am trying to make all space to to my home its just using like 70000mb
and what kind of partition? (fat32, ext3, etc)
I do prefer alternate, too. But I still don't get the point why you want to make /home a primary partition.
Just make it a logical partition and all should be fine.
i just choosed the file there :)
